entry.name: LogicMonitor_Portal_Alert_Statistics_Cache
entry.description: Populates collector script cache with cleared alert metrics and resources for use with alert statistics modules.

attribute.name: scriptgroovy

datapoint.name: alertsAddedToCache
datapoint.description: How many additional alerts were added to script cache during current poll

datapoint.name: alertCacheHit
datapoint.description:
Wether or not a script alert cache was found during polling.
0 = no script cache found 1 = script cache found

datapoint.name: alertsCurrentCacheSize
datapoint.description: how many alerts are currently stored in script cache

datapoint.name: alertsPreviousCacheSize
datapoint.description: How many alerts we stored in script cache when polling started.

datapoint.name: alertsLookbackPeriod
datapoint.description: Number of days to look back for resolved alerts. This value is set using custom property alert.lookback.period, if not present defaults to 1.

datapoint.name: executionTime
datapoint.description: Time taken to collect alert details.

datapoint.name: alertsRemovedFromCache
datapoint.description: Alerts purged from cache that fall outside of defined duration period.

datapoint.name: resourcesCacheHit
datapoint.description:
Wether or not a script resource cache was found during polling.
0 = no script cache found 1 = script cache found

datapoint.name: resourcesInCache
datapoint.description: Number of resources in script cache

datapoint.name: deviceGroupsCacheHit
datapoint.description:
Wether or not a script deviceGroup cache was found during polling.
0 = no script cache found 1 = script cache found

datapoint.name: deviceGroupsInCache
datapoint.description: Number of device groups in script cache
